text: Georgian Liga 3 (formerly Meore Liga) is serves as the third division of professional football in Georgia. It organized by Georgian Football Federation since 1990. ==Structure and league system== The league is split into a Red Group and White Group. As the third division of professional football in Georgia, the champion and runner-up of the Meore Liga are promoted to the Erovnuli Liga 2 == Liga 3 2019 == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- !Clubs !Region !Stadium !Capacity |- |style="text- align:left;"|FC Algeti Marneuli || Marneuli || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Aragvi Dusheti || Dusheti || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Bakhmaro Chokhatauri || Chokhatauri || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Betlemi Keda || Keda || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Borjomi || Borjomi || |- |style="text- align:left;"|FC Chiatura || Chiatura || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Egrisi Senaki|| Senaki || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Gareji 1960 || Sagarejo || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Gori|| Gori || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Imereti Khoni || Khoni || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Kolkheti Khobi || Khobi || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Merani Martvili || Martvili || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Meshakhte Tkibuli || Tkibuli || |- |style="text- align:left;"|FC Odishi 1919 || Zugdidi || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Saburtalo Tbilisi II || Tbilisi || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Samegrelo Chkorotsku|| Chkhorotsku || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Samgurali Tskhaltubo || Tskhaltubo || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Spaeri Tbilisi || Tbilisi || |- |style="text-align:left;"|FC Tbilisi City || Tbilisi || |- |style="text-align:left;"|Varketili FC || Tbilisi || |- |} == Winners == === Meore Liga === {| class="wikitable" |- !
